Realmente es un juego muy bueno, donde con el tiempo pierdes el sentido del juego y se te hace un juego de accion cooperaciÃ³n, dejando de dar nada de miedo (a veces si da sustos xd), sus mecanicas son un poco complejas pero bastante buenas, por lo que junto a diferentes opciÃ³nes de juego y de personajes, lo hace extremadamente bueno para ser competitivo, pero... eso implica que hay gente toxica jugando, de todas formas, debes de divertirte y disfrutar de jugarlo y sacarle sus logros tan buenos.

Edit(2021): Actualmente el sistema de emparejamiento a demostrado ser para muchos una pierdra en el camino, ya que las partidas, una tras otra, se vuelven mas competitivas, por lo que si buscas competencia en un sistemas de rangos con sus reinicios mensualmente de los mismos, puede que te guste el juego.
This is a lot of fun, I'd definitely recommend giving it a try!

El juego estÃ¡ muy bueno, tiene buenas mecÃ¡nicas, buenos personajes y muchas formas diferentes de jugarlo. Con tus amigos se pueden pasar buenos momentos. Lo malo? La comunidad, hay personas repugnantes que solo quiere arruinar la experiencia del juego de los demÃ¡s, si reciÃ©n comienzas en este fantÃ¡stico juego, si te gusta ser superviviente, te vas a comer una cantidad de asesinos tuneleros, camperos, y tÃ³xicos con comentarios al final de la partida como "Muy fÃ¡cil", sabiendo que lo Ãºnico que hicieron fueron quedarse viÃ©ndote. Si jugas de asesino te vas a encontrar con supervivientes que hacen tea bag, y el famoso click click.
El juego es muy bueno, lamentablemente esto no es algo menos por lo cual tu experiencia va a ser comprometida, pero si logras bajar de rango relativamente rÃ¡pido, tal vez encuentres partidas entretenidas, con asesinos que vayan a todos lados y persecuciones divertidas.

nao consigo abrir o jogo pois nao tenho placa de video e o pc n tem direct x 11 como tem como resolver?
Amazing game!

Good game and design is okay. I'd like to see focus on more technical areas such as hit boxes and/or dedicated servers depending on where the issue lies. As for balance, both sides (survivor and killer) have positives and negatives. Survivor does often fall short in comparison which is quite annoying since prediction is key. Again I personally feel that the general BS of the game lies within its pore execution when it comes to player-to-player contact aka killer weapon to survivor skull 7 meters away.
roim
O jogo Ã© muito bom, Ã³tima jogabilidade e um Ã³timo desempenho multiplayer, porÃ©m quando voce seleciona jogar como assassino o matchmaking se torna um pouco devagar. 9/10

Game constantly kicks me for alleged 3rd party interference after every patch. I have to reinstall every week, which as you can imagine is extremely annoying. Additionally, the dedicated servers are literal potatoes. Hitboxes and clipping glitches galore. The player base has gotten only slightly less toxic, but overall it doesnt seem very worth it to keep playing if there are going to constantly be issues with an anti-cheat that decides to be overzealous over minor file corruptions, and yet overlook wall hacking and other actual various 3rd party services.  /shrug

Edit 7/2021*
Actual gameplay has gotten leagues worse. Ever since the cross-platforming started, games have been nothing but toxic. Some perks have been nerfed to bring a bit more balance to the game, but overall small tweaks are useless in the face of players who only log on to farm. Additionally, reporting is only available to placate the reporter. It quite honestly shouldn't even be a function, as nobody even bothers to act on it. 
In conclusion: The disconnecting and false flagging of 3rd party software has gotten better- however the gameplay has totally gone to the toilet. Reporting is a useless feature, and the whole game is a toxic farm-fest that rewards unfortunate and unseemly behavior. Don't believe me? Try it out for yourself. 
Will update in a year.
